title: 18: Healing From The Past | EPP Bonus Episode 429
itunes:title: Healing From The Past | EPP Bonus Episode 429
description:
A young woman suffers several losses over the course of a short period of time. Did a spirit, who was part of that loss, return to help her see the light in the future ahead?

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!
